text: Hi, would you like to know more about the Save the Children organization and how you can make a difference?
Sure, tat suds interestin!noh
Millions of children around the world lack basic things like food, water, and shelter.  Our organization provides these things.
That sounds wonderful
Indeed, we also provide a lot in terms of school access and supplies
eat too!rg staTh
Yes, we provide impoverished children with lots of food as well so they don't stay hungry
where are they located
Many places around the world: Africa, Asia, etc.  We recently helped out villages in Somalia for instance
And the USA, right?
Yes, we have programs in the U.S. to help out low income families
Low income or homeless?
We offer problems for both
So how much can be donated?
Your donation will be directly deducted from your task payment. You can choose any amount from $0 to all your payment ($2).
And i can send it directly?
Yes, it will be sent to Save the Children
Cool! Sign me up!
Sounds good, how much would you like to give?
I'll donate $1
